Class DisplayAnswerFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • xyz.cathal.answerbox.DisplayAnswerFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, OnBackPressedListener

    public class DisplayAnswerFragment
extends android.app.Fragment
implements OnBackPressedListener
    This Fragment displays a solution chosen by the user.
    Author:
    Christopher Durning
